Actions.Name: Post Tax By Address [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This is a Batch offering for 'Tax By Address' service. It accepts a single address, purchase amount or a list of addresses, purchase amounts and retrieve applicable taxes.

Actions.Name: Post Tax By Location [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This is a Batch offering for 'Tax By Location' service. It accepts a single location coordinate, purchase amount or a list of location coordinates, purchase amounts and retrieve applicable tax.

Actions.Name: Post Taxrate By Address [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This is a Batch offering for 'Taxrate By Address' service. It accepts a single address or a list of addresses and retrieve applicable tax rates.

Actions.Name: Post Taxrate By Location [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This is a Batch offering for 'Taxrate By Location' service. It accepts a single location coordinate or a list of location coordinates and retrieve applicable tax rates.

Actions.Name: Get IPD Tax by Address [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This will accept 'address' as a parameter and will return one or many IPDs details for that region in which address will fall.

Actions.Name: Get IPD Tax for batch requests [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Get IPD Tax for batch requests

Actions.Name: Get Tax By Address [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This service calculates and returns taxes applicable at a specific address. Address, purchase amount and supported tax rate type are inputs to the service.

Actions.Name: Get Tax By Location [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This service calculates and returns tax applicable at a specific location. Longitude, latitude, purchase amount and supported tax rate type are inputs to the service.

Actions.Name: Get Taxrate By Address [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Retrieves tax rates applicable to a specific address. This service accepts address and supported tax rate type as inputs to retrieve applicable tax rates.

Actions.Name: Get Taxrate By Location [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Retrieves tax rates applicable to a specific location. This service accepts longitude, latitude and supported tax rate type as inputs to retrieve applicable tax rates.
